document_data.caption: A map showing Brondar's Way and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Brondar's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Brondar's Way''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Brondar's Way was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The alley ran north to south, branching from [[Delzorin Street]] and passing south to end on [[Hassantyr's Street]]. Brondar's Street was intersected by [[Sulmor Street]] near its midpoint and [[Thalaumbur's Trot]] connected with the southern end.
